summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Sales Call Performance Analysis system. Backend APIs working correctly with real audio files. Frontend UI fully functional with proper navigation, data display, and export capabilities. System successfully processes audio files through complete pipeline: upload → transcription → analysis → export.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Fails with fake/invalid audio files - requires valid audio format
flaky_endpoints.impact: Testing limitation only - production works with real audio

passed_tests: File upload with real audio files
Dashboard UI with stats cards and calls table
Call details page with tabs (Summary, Sentiment, Transcript)
Navigation between dashboard and call details
Real-time stats updates after analysis completion
Proper status badges and score display

success_percentage.backend: 87.5% (7/8 tests passed - 1 test failed due to fake audio file)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All UI components and navigation working correctly)
